casebody.data:
ENDREW F., a Minor, By and Through His Parents and Next Friends, JOSEPH F. and Jennifer F., petitioners,
v.
DOUGLAS COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT RE-1. No. 15-827. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 28, 2016.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
